title: Privacy Policy
intro: At Roos van Sharon, we respect your privacy. This page explains what data we collect and how we use it.
dataCollectionDesc: When you place an order or create an account, we collect:
dataCollectionList1: Your name, email address and phone number
dataCollectionList2: Delivery address (street, house number, postal code, city)
dataCollectionList4: Account details (full name, password) if you create an account
dataUsageTitle: How Do We Use Your Data?
dataUsageList4: Keep you informed about the status of your order
dataSecurityTitle: How Do We Protect Your Data?
dataSecurityList2: Personal data such as name, address and contact information are stored encrypted
dataSecurityList3: Access to data is secured and restricted
dataSecurityList4: We do not share your data with third parties, except when necessary for delivery
dataRetentionTitle: How Long Do We Keep Your Data?
dataRetentionDesc: We only keep your data for as long as necessary for the purpose for which it was collected. Order data is kept for administrative purposes. You can always request us to delete your data.
yourRightsList1: Request access to your personal data
yourRightsList4: Object to the processing of your data
contactDesc: For questions about privacy or your data, you can contact us through the contact page.
